item.title: Music Scales
item.description: In musci theory, Scales are fundamentals to start with. Scale is a collection of musical notes, Each scale will have 7 notes. There are 12 major scales in music as there are 12 notes in music(A, A#, B, C, C#, D, D#, E, F, F#, G, G#).
